explains: adj. 三向的；有三人参加的

sentences.en: Features include caller ID and three-way calling.
sentences.cn: 功能包括来电显示和三方通话。

sentences.en: This will mean installing a three-way motorised valve, a cylinder thermostat and making some changes in the pipe layout.
sentences.cn: 这将意味着安装一个三通电动阀，一个气缸恒温器并对管道布局进行一些更改。

sentences.en: This is just a three-way conditional.
